text: Lin Zhigang (born 1970) is a male Chinese former international table tennis player. He won a bronze medal at the 1993 World Table Tennis Championships and 1995 World Table Tennis Championships in the men's doubles with Liu Guoliang. Lin Zhigang is married to table tennis legend Deng Yaping. ==See also== * List of table tennis players ==References== Category:1970 births Category:Table tennis players from Guangdong Category:Chinese male table tennis players Category:Living people Category:World Table Tennis Championships medalists
title: Lin Zhigang
